snippet: An Army veteran wounded in Iraq made a unique ceremonial first pitch before Game 2 of the NL Division Series, crawling toward the mound and then lobbing the baseball as if it were a grenade....

headline.print_headline: Army Vet Throws 1st Pitch Like Grenade Before NLDS
headline.main: Army Vet Throws 1st Pitch Like Grenade Before NLDS

lead_paragraph: An Army veteran wounded in Iraq made a unique ceremonial first pitch before Game 2 of the NL Division Series, crawling toward the mound and then lobbing the baseball as if it were a grenade.
